name: Phil Hurlburt
text: Always just great service and pizza. Return myself on a regular basis. 30 min on most deliveries. The Howie Special cooked well done. Mmm

name: David Cline0926
text: Usually very pleasant experiences but just don‚Äôt get a calzone I guess. Paid $7 for a piece of a leaf and a chunk of tomato. Could have made a much better one myself for about 50 cents.

name: Evan Davis
text: I visit this excellent restaurant from time to time  as I love the  special atmosphere that is unique to this restaurant. The crew is highly welcoming and experienced. The service is exceptionally fast. Also, the food they prepare is ‚Ä¶More

name: Danielle Williams
text: Ordered a bunch of food tonight including 2 salads,bread,calzones and wings for delivery. It came in speedy time and my son's salad came incorrectly. He called and the manager made the corrections and sent out a new one. When the manager ‚Ä¶More

name: John Anderson
text: Consistently excellent pizza and great people

name: Marcous Amezola
text: Very good pizza, love the flavored crust

name: Ashley Gutowski
text: We have tried this location a few times. Quality compared to other Hungary Howies is low, not consistant. Orders have been wrong, one order was misplaced. We live close by and like Howie pizza but go elsewhere.

name: Dan Gizar
text: Hungry Howie's is definitely up there with pizza I enjoy feasting on. Got fast delivery good pricing and the staff is always friendly.

name: Samuel Gauthier
text: Best tasting pizza around in chesterfield New Baltimore area

name: Debra Kubiak
text: It's an okay place they have good food the people are very nice however the food is too greasy and they are way slow they told us 45 minutes we waited an hour and 15 then the guy over price charged me and gave me the wrong size sandwich called them they did nothing about it won't go there again wouldn't recommend it to anybody

name: Peggy Konen
text: They do my pizza the way we want itüòç

name: Shayna Currier
text: Love the sesame seed crust! It is my favorite!

name: Bill Johnston
text: 3 more pounds of sub for $6.35 !!! Best deal in town guys :). And I know !!

name: Audrey Tobias
text: Love their pizza and friendly wait staff

name: Mike Scott
text: It was okay for the food

name: Robert Mabry
text:
Always has ny order ready when I get there.
Staff are very friendly.

name: Eric Hays
text: Hours of operation are wrong on this btw. I know, for I was assistant manager for over 2 years. Hours are 12pm-10pm Sunday, 11am-10pm Mon-Thurs and 11am-12am Fridays and Saturdays
